title: Sayeeda Warsi – 2021 Comments about Allegra Stratton Laughing About Christmas Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sayeeda Warsi on Twitter on 8 December 2021.
content:
Every minister, parliamentarian & staffer at the #downingstreetparty must resign NOW.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
